vital_signs.heart_rate: Mildly elevated, normal after discontinuation of nortriptyline

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Thyroid enlargement, elevated levels of thyroid hormone, normal MRI of pituitary gland
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Heart rate normalizes after discontinuation of nortriptyline

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Elevated TSH suggesting THR, previous treatment with radioiodine
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: TSH decreased from 64 mIU/L to 5.8 mIU/L

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Previously treated for symptoms of hyperthyroidism, now hypothyroid
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Signs of hypothyroidism developed after treatment for hyperthyroidism
